```{r to_numeric, include=FALSE}
convertNumeric <- function(vector){
  if (any(is.na(suppressWarnings(as.numeric(vector))) == TRUE)){
    output <- vec
  }
  else {
    output <- as.numeric(vector)
  }
  return(output)
}
```
